```{r}
library(ggplot2)

require(openintro)
require(dplyr)
socmediadata <- read.csv('/Users/vktod/Downloads/smmh.csv') #This code must be altered to the respective file path of the original smmh file

names(socmediadata)[2] <- "age"
names(socmediadata)[3] <- "gender"
names(socmediadata)[4] <- "relationship_status"
names(socmediadata)[5] <- "occupation"
names(socmediadata)[6] <- "organization_affiliations"
names(socmediadata)[7] <- "social_media_use"
names(socmediadata)[8] <- "platforms"
names(socmediadata)[9] <- "average_daily_usage"
names(socmediadata)[10] <- "usage_with_no_purpose_score"
names(socmediadata)[11] <- "distraction_when_busy_score"
names(socmediadata)[12] <- "restlessness_without_sm_score"
names(socmediadata)[13] <- "distractability_score"
names(socmediadata)[14] <- "worry_score"
names(socmediadata)[15] <- "difficulty_concentrating_score"
names(socmediadata)[16] <- "comparison_rate"
names(socmediadata)[17] <- "compariosn_reflection"
names(socmediadata)[18] <- "validation_need"
names(socmediadata)[19] <- "depression_rate"
names(socmediadata)[20] <- "activity_interest_changes"
names(socmediadata)[21] <- "sleep_issue_rate"
socmediadata<- socmediadata %>% select(-platforms)
socmediadata<- socmediadata %>% select(-organization_affiliations)
write.csv(socmediadata, "social_media_usagefnl.csv", row.names = FALSE)

View(socmediadata)
harvardstudy <- read.csv('/Users/vktod/Downloads/Screentime_v_Mental_Health_Dataset.csv')
names(harvardstudy)[1] <- "screentime"
names(harvardstudy)[2] <- "mental_health_treatment"
names(harvardstudy)[3] <- "treatment_not_received"
names(harvardstudy)[4] <- "age"
names(harvardstudy)[5] <- "sex"
harvardstudy<- harvardstudy %>% select(-treatment_not_received)
harvardstudy <- harvardstudy[harvardstudy$age >=10, ]
#View(harvardstudy)
write.csv(harvardstudy, "Screentime_v_Mental_Health_Datasetf.csv", row.names = FALSE)



```
